name: Black Future
description:
Black Future is a Sci-Fi / Fantasy mobile runner game. It's set in a hyper-futuristic Egypt. This project aims to examine issues regarding racial expression, identity creativity in a new way. Imagine a world where African culture, as well as knowledge from other civilizations freely contributed to our shared way of life.

Explore a sci-fi meets fantasy world using our main character Raza. Raza is the chosen one who must escape society's mental enslavement in order to liberate the world.

Africa is believed to be the root of all human history and the oldest known human remains to be excavated here dates back at least 200,000 years ago. This brings us to ancient Egypt (formerly known as Mesopotamia) which was home to the earliest human civilization.

Black Future is a futuristic depiction of this utopian community.
